caption: They Should update their hours on all platforms because on ‘Maps’ it says they close at 8:30 but when we had gotten there they were already close at 8. And we had also seen 2 other customs going around the same time but only for them to see they were closed at 8 too.
Good taste but So overpriced. The bowls got smaller but the price stayed the same. I used to come here 2 years ago and had a nice and filling pitaya bowl. Insane.  $11 for a tiny bowl.
The food is not good at all. The meat is almost always dry and tough. Something that you definitely don't want in your dish
Adding the small bowl is awesome
purchased a acai bowl took it home only to realize its frozen not fresh
Love the coco loco. Can't wait to go back to try something different but for now, 5 stars.
Go for that Coco Loco bowl, you won't be disappointed.
Super nice staff...delish
Another one of my favorite places to visit and thanks to my daughter she has the whole family eating smoothie   🥣 they are healthy and very good and this place is great my money is my voice 👌
The bomb!!!
Very nice. Very clean. Nice selection of healthy food. Will definitely recommend and return in the future.
Good fruit shakes and protein drinks
the staff were nice and friendly
Watermelon Blast is pretty good, first time trying out Baya Bar.
Always really great on a hot summer day. Fruit is fresh and everything on the menu is so good. I highly recommend the coconut bowls for a delicious breakfast.
Healthy juices. A bit expensive

Pricey . Also..just had the 74th St. Smoothie..have had it before.  It's  good but $$ Anyway, this time..it had NO TASTE.  Taste like chips of ice that was constantly crunching in my mouth along with the cocoa chips. Fid not enjoy it at all. The baya bowls  also quite $$$
Great place for Acai or Dragon fruit bawl.
Fast service

EXTREMELY OVERPRICED. I went in there and got the biggest size acai bowl they had.. It was tiny. I paid $15 for a tiny bowl. I usually go to playa bowl and they are decently priced and have bigger bowls for cheaper. Not to mention the strawberries in my bowl were green. They also forgot to give me a bag so I went back in to ask for one and the lady behind the counter gave me terrible attitude. I DO NOT RECOMMEND.
Great,the bowls were amazing,definitely coming back.

Avid customer to Baya Bar. CONS - pricey for the size of the bowls, & they put too much toppings for the amount of purée fruit.  It’s too dry because of the excessive granola, & coconut shavings. If they give more purée then it would taste better. PROS - a healthy meal. It’s very filling.  My top recommendations are pacific beach bowl (Açaí), & Biya Pitaya which is the pink dragon fruit.  The coconut options are good as well. I dislike the Kale. Too many ice chips mixed into the purée.  Overall a good place, very clean, owners are very sweet and welcoming.  Love the business !!
Great but very pricy.
Amazing A+++

love what is served . really yummy but customer service is terrible . i asked about the pricing and i got an attitude back with a frown look at me . .. little bit over priced and terrible customer service. def not coming back here again
BAYA IS THE BEST PLACE EVER
delicious 😋
I love this place! Very friendly staff and the smoothies are great. Keep it up!!!

Really love Baya bar, it's my go to breakfast place, when we are in a rush.  I get the same thing every time and unfortunately had some inconsistency in my smoothies.  I guess it depends on who makes it.
My first time today honestly I love it chocolate proteins.
Açaí is a must to have at this place!!

(Translated by Google) Simply unique. Please go there. I am Italian and cleanliness, service and goodness come close to us perfectly. Good sandwiches wide selection of food. And then the fries practically as if you were at home. But they are FRESH AND NO FROZEN. Get out of a place known by chance with a smile and the knowledge that you have chosen the best. What to say? P.Š. a menu for only 13 dollars ??? A dream in one of the most beautiful areas of New York  (Original) Semplicemente unico. Vi prego andateci. Sono italiana e la pulizia il servizio e la bontà ci si avvicina perfettamente. Panini buoni vasta scelta di cibo . E poi le patatine fritte praticamente come se le facessi tu a casa. Ma SONO FRESCHE E NO SURGELATE. Uscire da un locale conosciuto per caso con il sorriso e la consapevolezza di aver scelto il migliore . Che dire? P.s. un menù a soli 13 dollari??? Un sogno in una delle zona più belle di New York
Delicious and healthy
Very Delicious & yummy juices & shakes.

Not bad but very sugary. They openly mock Catholics and Orthodox Christians calling one bowl "Kale Mary". If I were diabetic or pre diabetic I would ask for the carb content of the item I was ordering

I’m extremely mad! The original baya pitaya was so good and so sour. But you have recently changed your recipe and now it is sweet. I myself along with many others are very mad at this and would like you to change it back to the original recipe. I do not like the açaí because of its sweetness but I used to love the pitaya because of its sour taste. Please listen to my complaint and I hope to see that the recipe is like the old one!!!!!
Delicious!

Place is clean small and adorable. Just an ok selection of smoothies but taste good. The only issue is no one is talking to the customers. Nothing indicates one end is to place your order & pay side and the pick up your order side. Also you get a 3 for the wait time to get your order. Very very slow moving.
Beyond un impressed with this establishment. Waited 10 minutes for this place to open and they still didn’t open on time... Will take my business somewhere else.
Ok if you are in your 20s
Good place but a little pricey

Customer service is horrible. Absolutely horrible. A few members of the store team are decent enough to not be entirely rude or act like they hate their job but overall the customer service is terrible.
Great place, excellent bowls
Great açaí bowls! As close as you can get to Brazil.
Great smoothies and bowls
Interesting healthy food. Tiny store mostly for lunch or a quick bite. Unique healthy vegetarian dishes with flavor
Cheap on the base.  Not enough base in their bowls
Bowls too small for price,  but tasty
I'm obsessed with Baya Bar. the staff is super nice, I like the vibes too. The coconut flavor is my favorite. So delicious and filling.
Coconut bowls😊 Cookie butter 😋nutella 😍 Granola 🤩 🥥🍌🍓&blueberries Yummo❣
Disgusting. Felt like I was eating baby mush
“Healthy” option in neighborhood that is otherwise rich in pubs and pizza. Keep doing God’s work... Viva Fruits and Veggies! ...Also bee pollen is awesome
Very kind employees
Very good fresh food, friendly staff
This place is so cringy with all its “healthy” options, but overall the food/drinks are poppin. “Tha shi good” know what I mean? Bless up on the drink with hemp seed. Super fire.
Very clean place. The service is great and the workers are very nice. However delivery would be nice with in a certain distance.
So refreshing happy to have them in Bay Ridge
The Best acai bowl !!
Great smoothie Great service Great people
I AM SO IN LOVE WITH THIS PLACE. I LITERALLY GO HERE ON A DAILY BASIS!!
It's a good place undoubtedly.

I order here a few times a month since the weather's gotten warmer. I've only ordered their Pacific beach acai bowl, but it's very good. It's made of blended frozen acai, topped with blueberries, strawberries, granola, coconut shavings, and honey. I add peanut butter on top (additional $2 which I think is expensive, but it's not as sweet as regular pb, and I like it). Their prices seem standard for acai bowls, but I would eat it every day if it were cheaper.  It's a pretty small place, only has window seats for maybe 4 people, but mostly people order to go. There's barely a wait to order when I go, and I've only had to wait a few minutes for them to make my bowl. Staff is pleasant and quick.
Not the best Acai Bowls I've had to be honest
Yummy yummy in my tummy! Guilt free delights and the staff is always courteous.
Great bowls. Fast and friendly service
Great place very friendly staff and the smoothies on point

Ever since I started coming here, I can’t stop. The bowls are so good and fresh. I always order the Bella Nutella or the Dragon Bowl. The staff is friendly and I prefer when the Hispanic man makes my bowls because I’ve had some come out very ugly by the other workers. They recently just increased the bowls by a $1 which is kind of annoying because nothing has changed in the bowls.
Very delicious bowls. Alot of combinations. Menu is very clear and easy to order from. Food came out fast. Staff is friendly.
Great concept, delicious variety  of healthy choices; my kids are addicted! Super fast and very friendly service, too!
The bowls and smoothies are amazing. The service is always great and quick.
It was horrible
Friendly atmosphere, amazing staff, fresh delicious juices, smoothies and bowls. Bella Nutella is a must!

I just love these bowls! Never disappointed. I often start with a “3rd Ave” because it’s pretty basic then add whatever I’m in the mood for like cocoa nibs, almond butter, pineapple, or bee pollen! Love the Kale bowls too. Baya Bar makes something so good for you so delicious!
Great and healthy food. Friendly staff
Best pitaya bowls in town
Awesome place

To be 100% honest, this place is sadly very addicting. The food is very very good and they put people under the impression that it is healthy for you so people think it’s ok to go there a lot... which is smart. I went to Baya Bar the first day that it opened and I was pleasantly surprised and happy. The staff was very very nice to me, the owner told me his name and shook my hand (I was only 12) and asked me throughout my meal how I was doing and if I needed anything. I must say that when you go to eat at Baya Bar it is a very good experience. Not many negatives on that. But I do have a few complaints. Delivery is not so good. Many times I order, my order is brought to me wrong. For example, today I asked for a Bella Nutella Bowl with extra Nutella and no granola. Instead, they gave me a Bella Nutella, no extra Nutella and instead of no granola, they kept the granola and took out the coconut. How wrong is that? Also, the delivery man is very very VERY rude! I live literally 2 blocks away from Baya Bar and I placed an order today for two bowls and it came in 50 minutes when I was ordering I asked on the phone how long it was and they said a half hour which is still very long for two blocks away. Today I gave the guy a tip because I didn’t feel like dealing with his attitude but many times I gave him a low tip and twice I gave him no tip because quite frankly, it’s only two blocks away and you are delivering a tiny bag, you don’t deserve $4.00 from me and the time I gave him no tip, it took over an hour. When he is upset with what he gets, he talks back and argues and under his breath as he walks away, he always curses. I am a 13 year old girl. This is like a 60 year old man. Very rude. I don’t know what he does that takes him so long. I see him drive down my block and he isn’t a slow driver at all. I am under the impression that maybe he takes like cigarette brakes or something. I don’t know. As well as this, you have to think about what you are getting. You are getting a smallish bowl of fruit for  almost $12.00. It is very delicious but it is just not what it’s worth. My overall opinion is that if you go to eat there you are good. DO NOT DELIVER!

I ordered the Baya Pitaya bowl and put in the description, WITHOUT peanut butter and WITH Nutella. However, when the man delivered the bowl, it was COVERED ALL OVER WITH NUTELLA AND PEANUT BUTTER! What kind of a maniac combines both?!? And the worst is, I ordered it with extra Nutella, yet the peanut butter completely cancels out the flavor of Nutella. I called back to tell them, but they said I was ugly and to never come back. Please shut down Baya Pirates and their slimy strawberries.

If you were looking for the best Acai/Pitaya/Coconut/Kale bowl in NYC, it's worth trekking out to Baya Bar in Bay Ridge for the ultimate smoothie bowl experience.  They might be a hole in the wall with 6 seats available but if there's ever been a store I've fallen in love with so hard it's this one. First of all, 4 different types of bowls?! Sign me up forever!  The employees behind the counter are super wonderful and helpful. I've substituted ingredients a few times and they've been so pleasant about it. I usually order the Kale me crazy, baya pitaya or the north shore. Those are my favorite but I don't doubt for one second that the other bowls aren't as delicious as these.  I sometimes even dream about them :p seriously though, these bowls are worth raving about and only $10. The topping to smoothie ratio is so perfect I wonder why other stores don't learn a thing or two from Baya Bar.
Amazing food , I love it
Yummy Açaí bowls served to you by friendly people. Will definitely come back here again to try other things.
3 words: Refreshing, Healthy, Delicious!

Awesome Place!!! Everything you order is fresh & the bowls are gorgeous -  a delight in artistry every time. Every order is created with personal attention using the freshest fruit. Treat yourself once and I bet you'll be back again.
Clean, Friendly and no matter what you choose to consume, it will be delicious. Enjoy!! I know i did, Lol!!!
Great options and friendly staff!

By far my experience I've had so far!!! The staff were very nice and fast to make my Acai bowl. The vibes in the store is great and makes you wanting to come back for more and more. Definitely a place to go to BAYA BOWL IS A 5 STAR PLACE
My new favorite place!
Exactly what we needed in the Ridge. Fresh, delicious, good for you! Keep it up ✌️

A beautifully decorated chalkboard wall with a great selection of drinks and bowls, welcome you through the glass doors. The overall vibe of the space is inviting and fresh. This place is going to be hot spot in the summer time. The owner is very engaged with his store and customers. The sitting space is small but comfortable. I've had many Açai bowls from Hawaii to California and New York. This is definitely the best I've had in NYC. Good quality stuff. I'm glad it's here in my neighborhood of Bay Ridge.
Quick service , great bowls ....can't wait to go back !!!
